Name: Stunts above Clouds
About the game: Are you bored of doing the same trivial things? Try the Stunts above Clouds is a racing-simulation game that will give you emotional states that you probably have never had before. At the wheel of a supercar you will perform all kinds of stunts at an unimaginable height above the clouds. Your mission is to reach the final destination of each level without falling down. Also keep in mind that you have a limited time to reach the final destionation! If you're afraid of heights, it's important not to look down, because you can't even see the ground. We know that you are one of the brave ones, that's why you have to press the accelerator as much as possible to feel how your blood boils. Fasten your seat belt and don't forget that there is no chance of catapulting! Game features : - Multiple levels - A supercar - An extraordinary view above the earth - Time limit
